caption.p: Molecular interactions between ligand-receptor. ( a) Molecular binding of atractylon with the protein N-myristoyltransferase of the microorganism C. Albicans, ( b) Molecular binding of atractylon with the protein Enoyl reductase of the microorganism E. Coli, ( c) Molecular binding of atractylon with the protein Carbamate kinase of the microorganism E. faecalis, and ( d) Molecular binding of atractylon with the protein Sortase A of the microorganism S. mutans.
